properties.name: Superbe attique au centre de Genève
properties.summary: Superbe appartement attique lumineux (5ème étage) dans le quartier branché de Genève (Plainpalais). Pas d'ascenseur. Accès facile aux commerces et transports. Logement entier, 2chambres à coucher, chacune avec une salle de bain/douche. Un grand lit double par chambre, un grand salon avec cuisine ouverte.
properties.description: Superbe appartement attique lumineux (5ème étage) dans le quartier branché de Genève (Plainpalais). Pas d'ascenseur. Accès facile aux commerces et transports. Logement entier, 2chambres à coucher, chacune avec une salle de bain/douche. Un grand lit double par chambre, un grand salon avec cuisine ouverte. Situation centrale, lumineux, spacieux Logement entier, deux chambres, deux salles de bains, salon (écran tv curve) salle à manger, cuisine équipée. Nous restons volontiers disponibles pour renseignements durant le séjour car nous habitons et travaillons à proximité. L'appartement se situe dans le Quartier des Bains, comparé à SoHo par le New York Times. Une comparaison flatteuse en raison de ses galeries, cafés et restaurants réputés. Grand marché et petite restauration sur la plaine de Plainpalais (à coté) tous les dimanches Situé au coeur de Genève, le quartier de Plainpalais donne accès à tous les points de la ville en moins de 20 minutes (à pied, en tram, en voiture, en moto ou à
properties.neighborhood_overview: L'appartement se situe dans le Quartier des Bains, comparé à SoHo par le New York Times. Une comparaison flatteuse en raison de ses galeries, cafés et restaurants réputés. Grand marché et petite restauration sur la plaine de Plainpalais (à coté) tous les dimanches
properties.transit: Situé au coeur de Genève, le quartier de Plainpalais donne accès à tous les points de la ville en moins de 20 minutes (à pied, en tram, en voiture, en moto ou à vélo). Bords du lac à 10'. Parc des Bastions à 5'. Palexpo, parc des expositions, 10m en voiture, avec les transports publics env 20m. Parking public souterrain à proximité.
properties.access: Logement entier, deux chambres, deux salles de bains, salon (écran tv curve) salle à manger, cuisine équipée.
properties.interaction: Nous restons volontiers disponibles pour renseignements durant le séjour car nous habitons et travaillons à proximité.
properties.house_rules: Propreté et respect des lieux et décoration. Code confidentiel pour la porte d'entrée principale  Non fumeur.
properties.street: Rue de l'Ecole-de-Médecine, Genève, Genève 1205, Switzerland

properties.name: Quiet House with Swimming pool
properties.summary: Near the Geneva Lake (5minutes by foot) and Near downtown Geneva (7kilometers), our house is in a very quiet area.
properties.space: The house has only 3 bedrooms but is very spacious. The floor is 190m2 patio included. Vésenaz is a village of  7,000 inhabitants which lies on the left bank of Lake Geneva and just 7 km from the city center of Geneva. Privileged by its calm and near the center position. Annecy is 30 minutes, 20 minutes Yvoire, Chamonix 60 minutes. Very central to reach the ski resorts.

properties.name: Cozy Room with Private bathroom
properties.summary: We offer a cozy private room with a comfortable mattress, private shower and WC, in our newly refurbished 130sqm flat. We are in a quiet residential neighborhood, with direct bus to the airport (30min) and a direct tram to the city center (15min).
properties.space: We are airbnb travelers and we try to offer to our guests what we are looking for when we travel ourselves: a clean and comfortable accommodation with privacy!  In a spacious and luminous 130sq mater flat, we offer our renovated guest room with a brand new 140x200 cm mattress and a closet. Next to the room you have your private small bathroom with shower and a toilet.
properties.description: We offer a cozy private room with a comfortable mattress, private shower and WC, in our newly refurbished 130sqm flat. We are in a quiet residential neighborhood, with direct bus to the airport (30min) and a direct tram to the city center (15min). We are airbnb travelers and we try to offer to our guests what we are looking for when we travel ourselves: a clean and comfortable accommodation with privacy!  In a spacious and luminous 130sq mater flat, we offer our renovated guest room with a brand new 140x200 cm mattress and a closet. Next to the room you have your private small bathroom with shower and a toilet. You will have access to a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, should you wish to cook, and to our spacious living room with a big couch and table to chill out in the evening. We will be present in the flat, fully available for anything you may need yet leaving you space for privacy :) Quite, safe neighborhood with the supermarkets and Domino's pizza steps away. The flat is
properties.neighborhood_overview: Quite, safe neighborhood with the supermarkets and Domino's pizza steps away.
properties.transit: The flat is a few steps away from tram 12 and 14 that take you downtown in 15- 20 mins and bus 23 that takes you directly to the airport.
properties.access: You will have access to a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, should you wish to cook, and to our spacious living room with a big couch and table to chill out in the evening.
properties.interaction: We will be present in the flat, fully available for anything you may need yet leaving you space for privacy :)
properties.house_rules: Smoking only on the balcony and shoes off please :) We love pets but cannot allow them in the premises. And "No parties" :)
properties.host_about: I am Greek and I have been living in Geneva, Switzerland since November 2007. I enjoy running, sailing, diving, good food and wine and I am crazy about travelling the world and visiting new places!

properties.name: Apartment close to Gare Cornavin
properties.summary: Superb Apartment 2 minutes walking to Gare Cornavin. Ideally located between "Rue des Alpes" and "Rue du Mont-Blanc". Capacity for 4 People, one big bedroom and one big sofa bed. Perfect as a starting point to discover the Alps and the region.

properties.house_rules: Close to the Gare Cornavin, 3 minutes to the tracks. The closest Airbnb place to the station. 5 minutes walking to the lake Geneva, superb views and enjoyable rides by walk or by bike.

properties.name: Perfect for UN Intern ! Female only
properties.summary: Perfect for an UN Intern !! 20 min from United Nations, Geneva Airport.. Our beautiful and spacious apartment is located in Eaux-Vives, the best area in Geneva! Panoramic view of the famous Water Jet. Everything is in walking distance, lake in 5 mins
properties.space: Best and safest neighborhoods in Geneva ! Walking distance from everything : you'll save your time and your money ! The flat is big and the location is perfect for an UN Intern : 20 min from the UN.  Please read all the announcement and conditions, thanks. Walking distance from everything : you'll save your time and your money ! Many restaurants, shops, natural parks, activities etc. In the city center of Geneva, right next to the lake. Convenience stores, public transport, shopping street all at walking distance (10 minutes). Also, from our flat you can see the mountains and the famous Water-Jet of Leman Lake (le Jet D'eau du lac leman), symbol of Geneva. The lake is 5 min walking distance and 2 superb parcs : Parc des Eaux-Vives and Parc La Grange are just 5 minutes walking distance too. This is a great spots for doing sports, picnics and sunbathing ! Only 10 minutes walking from baby-plage (the only free public beach in Geneva where you can swim in the lake), 15 min from "plage de G

properties.neighborhood_overview: Best and safest neighborhoods in Geneva ! Walking distance from everything : you'll save your time and your money ! Many supermarkets, restaurants, shops, activities etc.
properties.transit: 20 minutes from the airport. 20 min from the UN. 10 min from the train station. (public transports)
properties.access: FREE OF CHARGE : - FREE High speed Wireless internet  - Clean towels - You can use our kitchen to cook (must be cleaned after each use)  -Freezer, cooker, Oven, rice cooker, complete kitchenware    - Dishwasher  - If you need to wash and dry your clothes it is also possible, we have a washer & dryer machine.  - Electricity / heat / water are included Important : No extra guests : you can not bring friend(s)/ extra guest(s) to the flat. Only for a female, calm, respectful, very clean and non smoking. (Also : no children, no smoking, no pets) * SKI STATIONS near Geneva : 40 minutes to 1 hour by car (there is also buses for some ski stations ) : - Famous Megeve ski station (70 km) - Famous Chamonix Mont-Blanc ski station (80 km) (you can enjoy Aiguille du Midi + Mer de Glace) - Les Carroz ski station (50 km) - Le Grand-Bornand (50 km)
properties.interaction: ONLY my girlfriend will be in apartment time to time (maximum few days every month). Approximately 90 %  of the time you will have all the apartment only for you.
properties.house_rules: Terms and conditions : By doing a reservation you totally agree to the terms and conditions on the website AND my own conditions undermentioned.  A legible email copy of your ID (passport) is expected prior to arrival (if I don't receive it before your check in, your reservation will be cancelled without any refund). After your arrival  a legible copy of your swiss permit is expected as soon as you receive it.  Important : No extra guests (only the person (1) who did the reservation can access to the building and to the apartment), if you don't respect this rule your reservation will be immediately cancelled : you'll quit the apartment immediately without any refund plus the totality of the caution. No pets, no kids, no smoking, no drugs, (alcohol is tolerate if moderate), no parties. Please remove your shoes in the corridor, before entering the room. Always clean up after yourself in the kitchen and bathroom Internet is offered free of charge.  In the unlikely event this is not workin
properties.host_about:
Hello, we are a swiss couple from Geneva. We love to travel and know new people and friends :)  We are new on airbnb and we want to offer a cheap, safe and nice place. Now, only my girlfriend will be in the flat. She will be there rarely (around 1 or 2 times per month, there is 2 big beds), so most of the time you'll have all the flat only for you. It's for female only. 

We will be pleased to welcome you in Geneva !
properties.street: Rue des Vollandes, Geneva, Geneva 1207, Switzerland

properties.name: Big charming studio in Plain Palais
properties.summary: My place is close to Carouge (3 minutes walking), the Arve river-long promenade (1 minute walking) and the University (5 minutes walking), restaurants and dining, supermarkets and public transport (tram 12, 18 and 15, bus 1). You’ll love my place because of the light, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families with kids and pets.
properties.space: The apartment is very functional and practical. It has everything one may need to spend some days or weeks in total relax. The place is silent and calm, still not too far away from university nightlife bars, restaurants, public transport, the Plain Palais area, and the characteristic neighbourhood of Carouge.
properties.description: My place is close to Carouge (3 minutes walking), the Arve river-long promenade (1 minute walking) and the University (5 minutes walking), restaurants and dining, supermarkets and public transport (tram 12, 18 and 15, bus 1). You’ll love my place because of the light, the comfy bed, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families with kids and pets. The apartment is very functional and practical. It has everything one may need to spend some days or weeks in total relax. The place is silent and calm, still not too far away from university nightlife bars, restaurants, public transport, the Plain Palais area, and the characteristic neighbourhood of Carouge. Full apartment. Advice and support during your stay is always available, either from the owner or from some close friends! The neighbours are also very nice and friendly. The Arve river is very close. It is possible to take long walks by the river, or to barbecue on its sandy beaches w
properties.neighborhood_overview: The Arve river is very close. It is possible to take long walks by the river, or to barbecue on its sandy beaches while enjoying the lingering sunlight, which at this time of the year (Summer) lasts until 9:45PM!
properties.transit: Trams 12 ans 18 stop Blanche are 1 minute away from the apartment. Bus No. 1 is also very close. The location is really strategic: you can go anywhere from here, the UN or the lake for instance, in no more than 20 minutes by combining public transportation and short, pleasant walks.
properties.interaction: Advice and support during your stay is always available, either from the owner or from some close friends! The neighbours are also very nice and friendly.
properties.house_rules: -Common courtesy -Avoid noise -Keep the whole studio clean and tidy -Lock the door when you go out -Switch off the lights when not in use
properties.street: Rue des Peupliers, Genève, Genève 1205, Switzerland

properties.name: Central - private & shower room
properties.summary: Private room and shower room in a cosy & bright apartment (120m2), in a family building. 2 min from the metro station "cornavin" and the lac,  15 min walking to the Palais des Nations.
properties.space: Perfect for business travellers or tourists who want the simplicity and comfort of a "home far from home" environment, with a central location, and possibility to cook at home.
properties.description: Private room and shower room in a cosy & bright apartment (120m2), in a family building. 2 min from the metro station "cornavin" and the lac,  15 min walking to the Palais des Nations. Perfect for business travellers or tourists who want the simplicity and comfort of a "home far from home" environment, with a central location, and possibility to cook at home. Apart from your room and private shower room, we would be happy to share with you a large and cosy living room, and our kitchen, where there is the table to eat. The flat will be shared with us (two (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) from different countries in europe). We could provide you some tips on how to discover the city or finding a nice bar/restaurant. Lively, affordable and alternative area contrasting nicely to the shopping streets on the other side of the river. The Pâquis quarter is one of Geneva's most colourful, where you'll find an attractive range of boho boutiques, bistros, restaurants, ethnic eateries, and nightclubs.
properties.neighborhood_overview: Lively, affordable and alternative area contrasting nicely to the shopping streets on the other side of the river. The Pâquis quarter is one of Geneva's most colourful, where you'll find an attractive range of boho boutiques, bistros, restaurants, ethnic eateries, and nightclubs. It is one of the most vibrant "neighbourhoods" of Geneva, where you will meet people from all continents, scents from far and near, busy streets and quiet parks only a few blocks away from the lake and the river.  It is the only area in Geneva, where you will find groceries or supermarket open on sunday till 22 pm within less than 150 m.
properties.transit: Very central: 150 m from the central station "Cornavin", 10 min from the airport, th UN headquarters and other major international organizations, 2 min from the lake
properties.access: Apart from your room and private shower room, we would be happy to share with you a large and cosy living room, and our kitchen, where there is the table to eat.
properties.interaction: The flat will be shared with us (two (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) from different countries in europe). We could provide you some tips on how to discover the city or finding a nice bar/restaurant.
properties.house_rules: - The flat is a non-smoking environment - Visits are not allowed - Animals are not allowed
properties.host_about: Je travaille dans le monde de la solidarité internationale et me rend fréquemment à l'étranger pour des missions de plus ou moins longues durée. Je suis par conséquent très habitué aux voyages et comprends le besoin de se sentir chez soit, même au quatre coins du monde.
properties.street: Rue de Neuchâtel, Genève, Genève 1201, Switzerland
